title: Chemical Worker Chan: Hazmat Biohazard Industrial Male Character
description: Chemical Worker is a human character well equipped to handle toxins, chemicals, bio-hazardous waste, and alien remains.
longDescription:
Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


Chemical Worker is a human character well equipped to handle toxins, chemicals, bio-hazardous waste, and alien remains. The model is divided into 3 meshes, the body, eyes, and gas mask. The gas mask is removable. Meshes were created using a retopologization and baking method from high-poly sculptures. Textures are PBR. Materials contain parameters for setting colors and several instances are included.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes [Actually rigged to Epic skeleton, no retargetting shenanigans. Just consolidate skeleton assets.]

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: 2337

Number of Textures: 18

Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096, 1024x1024, 512x512

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
